com.asascience.ncsos.describesen

Class SOSDescribeStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asascience.ncsos.describesen.SOSDescribeStation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SOSDescribeIF
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SOSDescribeGrid, SOSDescribeProfile, SOSDescribeSection, SOSDescribeSensor, SOSDescribeTrajectory

    public class SOSDescribeStation
extends Object
implements SOSDescribeIF
    Used to populate output for TimeSeries and TimeSeriesProfile feature sets. Is also used as a parent class for most other feature types. Describe Sensor requests to TimeSeries and TimeSeriesProfile datasets for response format "sensorML/1.0.1" output the following xml subroots: *Description *Identification *Classification *Contact(s) *History *Location *Component(s)
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    SCowan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void formatSetClassification(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
      Reads dataset for platform information (usually just platform type) for the output.
      protected void formatSetContactNodes(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
      Reads the dataset for contact information and passes along to output.
      protected void formatSetDescription(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
      Gives output the value of the description global Attribute
      protected void formatSetHistoryNodes(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
      Gives output the value of the history global Attribute, or tells output to delete the History root node if there is no Attribute
      protected void formatSetIdentification(DescribeSensorFormatter formatter)
      Reads the dataset for station Attributes and sends gathered info to formatter.
      protected void formatSetLocationNode(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
      Gives output the station name and coordinates for the Location root node.
      protected double[] getStationCoords(ucar.nc2.Variable lat, ucar.nc2.Variable lon)
      finds the latitude and longitude of the station defined by fields stationVariable and stationName
      protected int getStationIndex(ucar.nc2.Variable stationVar, String nameOfStation)
      Finds the index of the named station in the dataset
      void setupOutputDocument(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
      Tells the output handler to set up the response to a Describe Sensor request so that when writeOutput is called by the controller, all data for the response assembly is available.

      • SOSDescribeStation

        public SOSDescribeStation(ucar.nc2.dataset.NetcdfDataset dataset,
                  String procedure)
        Creates an instance to collect needed information, from the dataset, for a Describe Sensor response.
        Parameters:
        dataset - netcdf dataset of feature type TimeSeries and TimeSeriesProfile
        procedure - procedure of the request (station urn)

    • Method Detail

      • setupOutputDocument

        public void setupOutputDocument(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
        Description copied from interface: SOSDescribeIF
        Tells the output handler to set up the response to a Describe Sensor request so that when writeOutput is called by the controller, all data for the response assembly is available.
        Specified by:
        setupOutputDocument in interface SOSDescribeIF
        Parameters:
        output - the formatter to be used for the response

      • formatSetClassification

        protected void formatSetClassification(DescribeSensorFormatter output)
        Reads dataset for platform information (usually just platform type) for the output. If no info is found, informs output to delete the Classification root node.
        Parameters:
        output - a DescribeSensorFormatter instance (held by the handler)
